text: South Petherton is a small town in Somerset, a county in England. Over 4, 000 people live there. It is twinned with the town of Javan√©, which is in France. There are two schools in South Petheton: South Petherton Infants School, which is run by the Church of England and is for children from the age of 4 to 7, and South Petherton Junior School, which is for children aged 7 to 11.
